result.title: Functional Programming Contest, Lambda Calculi July'14
result.content:
Lambda Calculi (Functional Programming Contest) is back with 7 interesting challenges lined up for July edition. This contest will commence at 6 30 AM UTC, 18th July and will run for a extended period of 10 days. You can sign up for the contest here. Registration will be open till the end of contest.

This contest is primarily aimed for the functional programming enthusiasts and whosoever interested in learning this.

This month's contest is prepared by Pavel Lepin, wRabbits_AlMag, Grant Boudreaux, darkshadows, Jaydeep Solanki, tussharsingh13, ashu1461 and me.

Languages allowed are: Haskell, Scala, Lisp, Erlang, Clojure, OCaml and F#.
